sql:
CREATE TABLE "actions" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"journal_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"original_date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"status" "action_status" DEFAULT 'incomplete' NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "days" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"journal_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"title" text DEFAULT to_char(now(), 'FMDay, YYYY Month DD') NOT NULL,
	"date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT "days_journalId_date_unique" UNIQUE NULLS NOT DISTINCT("journal_id","date")
);

CREATE TABLE "events" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"journal_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "journals" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"title" text DEFAULT 'Unnamed Journal' NOT NULL,
	"intention" text DEFAULT '-' NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "moods" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"journal_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"level" integer,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "notes" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"journal_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"date" date DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_by" text NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "actions" ADD CONSTRAINT "actions_journal_id_journals_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("journal_id") REFERENCES "public"."journals"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "days" ADD CONSTRAINT "days_journal_id_journals_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("journal_id") REFERENCES "public"."journals"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "events" ADD CONSTRAINT "events_journal_id_journals_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("journal_id") REFERENCES "public"."journals"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "moods" ADD CONSTRAINT "moods_journal_id_journals_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("journal_id") REFERENCES "public"."journals"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "notes" ADD CONSTRAINT "notes_journal_id_journals_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("journal_id") REFERENCES "public"."journals"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
